By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.

In this video, I unbox and test some of the weirdest gaming accessories you've probably never heard of. From piano gloves that turn your hands into instruments to a soundproof gaming mask, we dive into the good, the bad, and the downright bizarre. I even found a surprisingly decent Nintendo Switch grip that might actually be worth your money.

Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok
title: The Most Unhinged MYSTERY TECH...
